thread.title: 'Deewani Mastani' Song Launch Pics! Deepika Padukone Stuns All With Her Gorgeous Avatar!
thread.title_full: 'Deewani Mastani' Song Launch Pics! Deepika Padukone Stuns All With Her Gorgeous Avatar!

title: 'Deewani Mastani' Song Launch Pics! Deepika Padukone Stuns All With Her Gorgeous Avatar!
text:
Posted by: Swikriti Srivastava Updated: Sunday, October 18, 2015, 4:41 [IST] 
The much awaited film, Bajirao Mastani 's 'Deewani Mastani' song is out now and audiences are going gaga over Deepika Padukone 's stunning look in this particular song and here we have brought to you Deewani Mastani song launch pics, in which Deepika Padukone is looking so stunning! 
The song launch event was held in Delhi, which showcased Anju Modi's special ' Bajirao Mastani ' themed designed costumes and the Bajirao Mastani actress was also seen walking the ramp for Anju Modi, dressed as Mastani. 
The popular designer Anju Modi has designed Deepika's look in the song 'Deewani Mastani' and we gotta say she is looking breath-taking beautiful in the song. Watch Bajirao Mastani Exclusive Song 'Deewani Mastani' Here, Deepika Will Steal Your Heart! 
Interestingly, it was also the launch of the 11th Blenders Pride Fashion Week, which has collaborated with a film for the first time. On the same, when Deepika was being asked about the reason behind launching the song in this unique way, she said "I think we all felt that this was the perfect place to showcase a song of this scale and grandeur."Check out the amazing pictures of Deepika Padukone from the song launch event here! Deepika's Stunning Pics At 'Deewani Mastani' Song Launch! 1/16 Beautiful Deepika Padukone 
Deepika Padukone looking breath-takingly beautiful in her cream coloured traditional outfit and we just cant take our eyes off from her! Deepika's Stunning Pics At 'Deewani Mastani' Song Launch! 2/16 
And here comes the close-up picture of our Mastani, attending the song Deewani Mastani launchevent. Deepika's Stunning Pics At 'Deewani Mastani' Song Launch! 3/16 
Gorgeous Deepika Padukone walking the ramp for designer Anju Modi, at the song launch event. Deepika's Stunning Pics At 'Deewani Mastani' Song Launch! 4/16 Her Expressions! 
And we gotta say that with those pretty expressions, Deepika just know, how to make people go mad for her more! Deepika's Stunning Pics At 'Deewani Mastani' Song Launch! 5/16 Deepika As Mastani 
Deepika Padukone walking the ramp as Mastani, which will be her character in her upcoming film, Bajirao Mastani. Deepika's Stunning Pics At 'Deewani Mastani' Song Launch! 6/16 Interacting With Media 
Deepika Padukone interacting with media as well as designer Anju Modi, at the song launch event. Deepika's Stunning Pics At 'Deewani Mastani' Song Launch! 7/16 Designed By Anju Modi 
The song launch event was held in Delhi, which showcased Anju Modi's special 'Bajirao Mastani' themed designed costumes at the fashion show. Deepika's Stunning Pics At 'Deewani Mastani' Song Launch! 8/16 
Deepika Padukone getting clicked at the song launch, while interacting with media persons. Deepika's Stunning Pics At 'Deewani Mastani' Song Launch! 9/16 Deepika Sharing Her Experience 
Deepika also shared her experience about portraying the role of 'Mastani' in her upcoming film Bajirao Mastani. Deepika's Stunning Pics At 'Deewani Mastani' Song Launch! 10/16 
A candid picture of Deepika Padukone from the song launch event. Deepika's Stunning Pics At 'Deewani Mastani' Song Launch! 11/16 All Set For Song Launch Event 
When the sets were getting ready for the event, which was held in Delhi. Deepika's Stunning Pics At 'Deewani Mastani' Song Launch! 12/16 Deepika's Look In Deewani Mastani 
And here come the look of Deepika Padukone in Deewani Mastani song and she is looking no less than dream! Deepika's Stunning Pics At 'Deewani Mastani' Song Launch! 13/16 Models Showcasing Anju Modi's Collection
